title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title. However, the actual result is that it cannot be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank.
3. Add the externalized text with a valid value.
4. Verify that the text cannot be displayed in the chart.
